Articles.Content: I was wondering when I can customize my profile? Any answers would be great!

Hi Rocket_man, now you are up to 5 posts, you will soonn be upgraded to a Bottle Rocketer, and you will be able to edit your profile, you just need to wait for the vBulletin script to run and automatically update you
Right, I'm new to forums so I don't really know. Thanks for the help!
